text: Goodmorning guys, it is 5:30am in the morning.

And we are here at the beautful little mountain 
 town at the base of Macchu Picchu
Please forgive me, I can't even think right now
And we are headed up to see Macchu Picchu today!
Look, that's where we are going! All the way up there!
We are going to the sunwell to go see, .... I guess the sun.

The altitude is messing with my head. I dont really 
 get sick from altitude sickness, I just get....

Sungate. Where is the sun suppose to come from......the sky. The sun is suppose to 
 shine through the gate onto Machu Picchu, but today is not that day.

So the clouds have parted and now we 
 get a full view of Machu Picchu.
There are so many Alpacas up here just chilling, easting grass, playing with tourists...

Hello my name is Nadine and I am the Alpaca/Llamas whisperer...come, come...I am 
 going to try and herd...herd this way...this is working so well.

That is the ancient Inca sundial to tell what time it is, time, date, 
 year. Guy: what time is it? Nadine: I dunno, there is no sun.

Nadine: What are we doing? Guy: Making up history.This is the 
 Inca ruins and as you can see they are ruins...
